hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util

Class Func0Builder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util.Func0Builder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the return type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Func0<T>

    public final class Func0Builder<T>
extends Object
implements Func0<T>
    Class holding a Func0 object and providing various relevant methods of the Functions utility class as instance methods.

    The class itself is of type Func0<T> and can be used where this type is needed.

    Since:
    0.96.1
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2012.02.02.

                               Reference<? extends T> ref)
        Wraps the given reference object into a function call.

      • not

        @Nonnull
public Func0Builder<Boolean> not()
        Returns a function which takes the logical not of the wrapped boolean returning function.

        Note: this function will throw a ClassCastException if the current function return type is not Boolean.

        Returns:
        the function builder.
